transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello scientific and engineering work se baat kar raha ji sir sir very good morning baat kar raha ke aapki side se concern aaya tha India mart ki jo customer mail aapke jo registered mail hai.com se feedback mail aaya tha sir ji kuch catalog me changes ko leke so jan sakta hu ki kya help kar sakta hu aapki
Customer: sir actually kya hai meri kai bar baat ho chuki hai mere pass by lead sirf do ki aati hai Salemcon aur tube mold ki
Executive: Salemcon aur tube mold ki okay
Customer: iske alava koi by lead nahi aati
Executive: okay okay okay yaha pe agar mai check karu to aapki jo consumption yaha pe pattern created durable lab equipment karke apna ek category hai
Customer: ha ji
Executive: compression testing machines hai
Customer: nahi sir
Executive: compression testing machines karke aisa koi category nahi hai
Customer: test nahi hai sir
Executive: testing se testing machine nahi nahi
Executive: okay but ye ek aisa product bhi added hai us pe kuch lead bhi consume hua testing machine karke hai compression testing machine aisa koi category nahi hai utna
Customer: nahi sir
Executive: okay mai isko remove kar deta hu fluid medicine medicine lab karke apna aur category hai
Customer: fluid mechanics ha mechanics lab karke aur uske baad PVC cube mold ka jo aap bata rahe uska lead aapke pass sabse jyada hai okay sir actually me hota kya hai na mera jo system hai na wo purchase pattern ke bihaf me lead ka flow show karta hai suppose jaise aap youtube use karte hai na sir youtube chalate honge ji hai na to youtube me jo cheez hum search karte hai jis tarike ka video ko search karte hai jab dobara se youtube kholte hai same as it is hame youtube aisa hi video show karta hai jo humne pichli bar search kiya hota hai to india mart ka system kya hai na as it is usi ki tarah work karta hai ki aapne jo by lead previous time me sabse jyada consume kiya hai na usi ki leads aapko jyada wo reflect karega show karega okay to mai kuch aapko steps guide karta hu jaise aapko kis category ka lead jyada chaiye sir abhi kis ka nahi aa raha aapke pass
Customer: dekhiye sir pichle jab se maine isko starting kiya hai mere pass ek bhi order nahi aaya
Executive: conversion nahi mila na
Customer: hmm okay lekin pehle fluid mechanics ke maine jo aapke liya liya baat karti hai mere se maine kaha mere pass fluid mechanics hogi mere pass paper testing machine hogi structure mechanics hogi inki sabke india mart pe already log utha rahe hain unhone kaha sir ye to pichle che mahine se kisi ne search hi nahi kiya
Executive: nahi to mere product koi search nahi karta mai isko rakhunga kyu paper wala jo category bataya uska ek bar category bataye mai search kar raha yaha pe paper machine se related paper testing machine
Customer: paper testing machine
Executive: okay double folding paper tester machine theek hai ek aapka ye paper testing equipment machine hai folding sir ek kam karte hai aap services kaise dekhte hai laptop ke computer se dekhte hai mobile application mobile se dekhte hai mobile se dekhte hai mai aapke sath google meeting schedule kar raha hu jahan pe mai every bahut bar ho chuki bahut bar ho chuki actually mai sir mai bahut pareshan hu google meeting se kuch nahi hota kuch nahi hota aap karo kuch nahi hota mai yaha pe call pe bhi cheeze correct kar sakta hu lekin aap dekhiye jitne bhi employed hai na wo aadhe tak jate hai sir aise hi kar lena aap ye language hai unki
Customer: aise hi kar lena
Executive: customer customer khud hi karega kya are aap google meeting kar rahe ho agla banda apna samay nikal ke de raha hai ji to aap aadhe pe ja ke kyu bol rahe sir aise hi honge sab aise hi kar lena aap theek hai kar lenge aapko engineer sir ek baat batao mai yaha ka senior baat kar raha hu to bhi seniors ne hi baat ki aisi baat nahi pehle bahut sare senior se baat karte hai sabhi yahi bolte hai manager bol raha hu mai senior baat kar raha hu mai sab aise hi aap problem bataye 50 bar google meeting hogi
Customer: ji ji mai mahine april me kiya tha starting jab se hi google meeting karta aa raha hu maine kaha mere score kyu nahi badh rahe hain unhone kaha aise karo maine vaise kiya maine aur bhi kiya usko din me activate bhi rehta hu aap dekh rahe honge lekin usme teen hi koi hamare scientific lab me teen equipment nahi hai salmcon tube mold yahi rehti hai aati rehti hai aati hai mujhe koi aap category batayenge ek jisko aapne ko lead nahi aa raha hai chaiye sir kyuki
Executive: fluid mechanics ho gaya paper testing machine ho gaya structure machine ho gaya aur hydraulic machine ho gaya inke mere pass aati nahi kya karenge hum testing machine ek second sir ek second paper testing machines okay
Executive: fluid mechanics fluid fluid mechanics lab sheet bata rahe na aap
Customer: ha ji ha ji
Executive: okay
Executive: abhi maine khud search kiya india mart portal pe ja ke ye dono category ko to mujhe abhi show kar raha hai no by leads are available iska reason dikha raha hai ki ye jo product hai aapka kafi unique product hota hai ki market me isko koi bhi jyada search ya fir jisko jyada requirement nahi rehti ya koi aam aadmi person purchase nahi kar sakta iski vajah se lead ka flow hi online me kam rehta hai aur jo lead aati hai wo agar hum log iska time ke sath search karke iska reply back karte hai to uska notification aapke system pe activate ho jayega to kahi na kahi jo bhi leads aayegi na turant uska notification aapke portal pe wo show karne lagega ki lead aa rahi hai aap usko turant aap consume kar sakte hai kyuki ek by lead pe limitation hota hai panch supplier hi utha sakte hai sir to maybe kabhi kabhi ye bhi hota hai ki jab tak aap us lead ko reach out karte hai wo lead expire bhi ho jati hai sir iski vajah se show bhi nahi karti hai sir mere pass 12 12 ghante late aati hai
Customer: nahi late to by lead to nahi aata uska mai aapko bata raha hu ek issue aata hai matlab ek aata hai mere ko usme ka yaad nahi hai kuch aise aata hai
Executive: this lead expire
Customer: ha lead expire bilkul lead expire ka to lead expire ka issue to aa raha hoga because kya hai na sir ye jo product hai aapka aapko bhi pata hai ki market me koi bhi aisa koi person aam aadmi purchase nahi kar sakta aur jab koi requirement aati hai to market me supplier basis pe bahut better india mart ho gaya kahi pe bhi aap dekhne ko jaoge iske supplier count bahut hai to ek lead pe agar suppliers contact bar pe click karte hai to panch supplier usko lead uthane ke baad wo lead expire ho jati hai to hum ek better kam karte hai aapke pass notification aata hai sir lead ka kabhi kabhi notification aata hai notification ke turant baad bhi agar mai usko expose karta hu ki chalo isme call karte hai to uske baad bhi nahi hota batao mere pass message aaya jab jab customer ne try kiya ye bhi to message aaya mere pass itni der me expire kaise ho gaya minute me kaise expire ho gaya aap bhi mante minute to bahut jyada hote hai because usme kya hai notification aapke pass aa raha hai ji to other suppliers ke pass bhi jata hai jo jiska ye product preferred hota hai to koi bhi aadmi hoga wo turant isi irade se to nahi baitha hoga ki turant aaye turant karne aa jaye minute lagte hai sabhi bilkul nahi hota lekin kuch suppliers ke na team baithi hoti hai kyuki ye jo product agar usse ek lead bhi mil rahi hai agar wo sahi tarike se us follow back le raha hai aap mere ko number apna personal aisa hi jo mil jayega india mart ke through aaya aap mere ko kariye mai time nikal ke aapse baat thoda baad me karta hu please just request rahega aap agar direct mere sath connect karenge to mai for sure aapka better help karunga sir theek hai sir hai na aur aapke pass ek please feedback aayega mere sath discussion me koi concern ko leke to please aap positive feedback kijiyega mai aapko whatsapp pe direct connect karta hu
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants more buyleads for specific categories.

- States no orders received since starting.

- Expresses frustration with Google Meetings.

- States leads expire too quickly.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how the system works.

- Executive offered to connect on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, google meeting, product category, lead expiration
